segments.text: I am observing an indoor kitchen scene, quite typical in many ways.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands by the sink, completely engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her back is slightly turned, but her focus is clearly on that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the faucet is running, and water is rapidly filling the sink basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's not just full; it's actively overflowing, pouring onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A continuous sheet of water streams down the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It has created a significant puddle on the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in that puddle, submerged almost entirely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, she shows absolutely no sign of noticing; her expression remains blank.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so unaware of such an obvious issue?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage will be considerable if this continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about her slipping on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
